biocontainers.name: wg-blimp
biocontainers.summary: wg-blimp (Whole Genome BisuLfIte sequencing Methylation analysis Pipeline)

biotools.summary: wg-blimp (Whole Genome BisuLfIte sequencing Methylation analysis Pipeline) can be utilised to analyse WGBS data. It performs alignment, qc, methylation calling, DMR calling, segmentation and annotation using a multitude of tools. First time using wg-blimp? We recommend having a look at our step-by-step guide
